articles.title: KCNA Report on Putting American in Custody
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Putting American in Custody
						
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A relevant organ of the DPRK put in custody American Miller Matthew Todd, 24, on April 10 for his rash behavior in the course of going through formalities for entry into the DPRK to tour it.
					 He had a tourist visa for the DPRK, but tore it to pieces and shouted hoarse that "he would seek asylum" and "he came to the DPRK after choosing it as a shelter." This was a gross violation of its legal order. 
					
					 The relevant organ put him in custody after taking a serious note of his behavior, and is now investigating the case.

articles.title: Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Senior Party, State and Army Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the party, state and army including Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, commanding officers of the services and corps-level units of the Korean People's Army and officers and men of KPA visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and paid profound homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Friday, 82nd anniversary of the KPA.
					 Seen before the statues of the great Generalissimos was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Placed before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants paid profound tribute to the statues of the great Generalissimos.
					
					 At the halls of immortality, they made bows to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders Kim Il Sung and 
					
					Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, an electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Papers Mark Anniversary of KPA
articles.content:
Papers Mark Anniversary of KPA
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Today is the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 On this occasion the DPRK papers Friday editorially stress that the Korean People's Army (KPA), revolutionary armed forces of Juche type, is invincible.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the foundation of the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces provided a strong fulcrum for carrying out the idea and cause of the leader and enabled the Korean revolution to record the immortal hero epic of the anti-imperialist struggle from its early period.
					
					 The paper goes on:
					
					 There are many countries in the world and each country has its own army. But there is no revolutionary army as the KPA, which emerges ever-victorious by creating a great history of defending and carrying forward the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 The KPA has decisively smashed the moves of all alien elements and betrayers with revolutionary arms and devotedly defended the Party and leader in the grim annals of the revolution. Its immortal merits are clearly recorded in the history of the country.
					
					 The leadership of the Korean revolution is secure as the spirit of defending Kim Il Sung and the spirit of defending the command, displayed by the anti-Japanese forerunners, prevail in the whole army.
					
					 It is the revolutionary disposition of the army and people of the DPRK that they will never allow the sovereignty of the country to be infringed upon even a bit but turn out to smash those moves without mercy
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's revolutionary powerful army is fully combat-ready to sweep away the aggressors' bases just like snowstorm and lightning of Mt. Paektu once an order is given. Korean style socialism is impregnable as it has such an elite army.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that the revolutionary cause of Juche and revolutionary cause of Songun are sure to win victories as long as the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism illumines the way ahead of the army and people of the DPRK and as there are the leadership of Kim Jong Un and the invincible and powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korea's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Racket Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The first vice-minister of the south Korean puppet Ministry of Foreign Affairs some days ago said at the Committee for Diplomacy and Unification of the "National Assembly" that he conveyed the UN the "willingness" to set up "Office for Human Rights in North". The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry also said that the ministry would "actively examine" the issue on setting up the office. Even the coteries of the "Saenuri Party" made public a joint statement calling for the establishment of the UN "Office of Human Rights in North".
					 Minju Joson Friday in a commentary terms this another politically-motivated intolerable and despicable provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The office is a plot-breeding organization that was formed by the U.S. to realize a "regime change" in the DPRK under the pretext of human rights issue, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 The present south Korean conservative forces seek to set up the office in south Korea, an indication that they are die-hard confrontational maniacs putting their predecessors into the shade.
					
					 The aim sought by them through their desperate bid to have the office based in south Korea is to use it as a base for internationalizing the non-existent "human rights issue" of the north and stepping up the anti-DPRK human rights racket to seriously hurt the dignity and social system in the DPRK.
					
					 The conservative ruling quarters also consider putting pressure on the opposition parties and progressive democratic forces in a bid to ram the "Bill on Human Rights in North" through the NA, and use it in favor for the elections to local self-governing bodies slated for June.
					
					 The puppet group should ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its unwarranted anti-DPRK human rights campaign and behave with discretion.

articles.title: S. Korea's Drone Case Is Replica of "Cheonan Case": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korea's Drone Case Is Replica of "Cheonan Case": Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- It is an inveterate bad habit of the south Korean authorities to cook up a conspiratorial case and escalate confrontation with the DPRK by linking it to the DPRK whenever they are driven into the tight corner, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The recent drone case is a replica of the "Cheonan" sinking case, a heinous conspiratorial farce for escalating confrontation with the DPRK, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 As the time goes by and as the south Korean authorities present more evidence, it is becoming clearer that the drone case is a sheer fabrication just like the "Cheonan" case. Herein lies the tragicomedy of the case.
					
					 The puppet group which fabricated the poor farce is set to use it in evading the responsibility for the escalating tension on the Korean peninsula and further kicking up the racket for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces, driven into the tight corner, have cooked up the drone case and worked hard to build up public opinion over the case in order to divert elsewhere the public criticism and to resort to the confrontational moves.
					
					 What is more serious is that they are becoming all the more undisguised in their moves to provoke a war against the DPRK while clamoring for "adopting stronger security posture" under the pretext of the drone case.
					
					 All facts prove that the south Korean authorities have gone desperate in their moves to deter the north-south relations from making progress, escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen and provoke a war against the north through the fabrication of the anti-DPRK conspiratorial case.
					
					 The puppet forces should bear in mind that the anti-DPRK conspiratorial farce will get them nowhere but only disclose their despicable nature as they work hard to hurt the north-south relations, harass peace on the peninsula and provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Tanzanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tanzanian President
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete, president of Tanzania, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its foundation. 
					 Kim in the message said that the Korean people are pleasured as over their own with the fact that the friendly Tanzanian people have consolidated the political independence of the country and achieved a great advance in all fabrics of social and economic life for the past half a century.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Tanzania with a long history and good tradition would grow stronger in the common interests and desire of the peoples of the two countries, Kim wished the Tanzanian president bigger successes in his responsible work and friendly Tanzania prosperity.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chairman of IWF
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chairman of IWF
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday met and had a friendly talk with Tamas Ajan, chairman of the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF) who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Chairman of IWF Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chairman of IWF Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Tamas Ajan, chairman of the International Weightlifting Federation (IWF), Friday visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary life of Kim Il Sung and the family members of Mangyongdae, the chairman looked round historical relics preserved there with care.
					
					 He said Mangyongdae is a historical place, adding he was deeply impressed to visit the old home of the President, founder of the DPRK. He said Kim Il Sung was a great man of the world.

articles.title: Ceramic Craftwork, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Businessperson
articles.content:
Ceramic Craftwork, Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Businessperson 
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Among the exhibits at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK, there is a ceramic craftwork "Images of Three Generals", a gift presented to leader Kim Jong Il by the general manager of a trading company in Dandong, Liaoning Province, China in February Juche 86 (1997).
					 Born in the DPRK, the general manager became well aware of the great personality of the three generals of Mt. Paektu, President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 When visiting the International Friendship Exhibition House, the general manager was deeply impressed to see many gifts presented to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by progressives worldwide, including Chinese party and state leaders.
					
					 Back home, the general manager prepared a ceramic craftwork picturing the images of the three generals, as a gift to Kim Jong Il in representation of profound reverence for him.
					
					 The craftwork shows Kim Il Sung in generalissimo uniform, Kim Jong Il in marshal uniform and Kim Jong Suk in guerrilla uniform against the background of blossoms of Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia and azalea.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Foreigners have visited the KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment here. 
					 Anders Kristensen, head of the delegation of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said the visit helped him know clearly about the might of the DPRK. To defend oneself from invasion, one has to possess power for self-defence to repel it, he said, noting with appreciation that the DPRK has directed big efforts into increasing the capabilities for national defence.
					
					 Raymond Ferguson, head of the delegation of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture, said the museum is a wonderful place showing the will of the Korean people to defend the country and its sovereignty. He added the Juche-based spirit of self-reliance of the DPRK is so great, stressing the museum is an excellent edifice that can hardly be found in any other place of the world.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, head of the delegation of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, noted the Korean people built such a wonderful museum under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un. He added the museum is a good educational place showcasing the ever-victorious history of the DPRK and the invincibility of the great Songun politics.
					
					 Zhang Guixin, assistant to the president of the Liaoning Provincial Association for International Friendly Contact, said the museum is associated with self-less devotion and efforts made by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the development of the defence industry of the DPRK. This is an epitome of the history of the development of weapons and equipment of the KPA, he added.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were laid before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited their statues on Mansu Hill to pay profound tribute.
					
					 Seen standing before their statues was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the names of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments at all levels, farms, schools, etc.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children paid tribute to the statues of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu recollecting their army-building exploits.
					
					 Many service personnel and people have visited the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their smiling portraits in different places of Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung Military University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and the Mansudae Art Studio.
					
					 People across the country laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their portraits in their residential quarters.

articles.title: Group of Koreans in Japan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Group of Koreans in Japan Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A visiting group of Koreans in Japan mounted the Mansu Hill and put bunches of flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute Friday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Offers Floral Tribute to Martyrs
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Offers Floral Tribute to Martyrs
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here laid wreaths before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Friday, 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The members of the corps laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the cemetery on Mt. Taesong and observed a moment's silence.
					
					 A wreath in the name of the military attaches corps was placed before the wreath-laying stand at the cemetery.
					
					 They paid silent tribute to the martyrs who fought with total dedication for the liberation and prosperity of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They also placed a wreath before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" at the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 They paid tribute to the officers and men of the KPA who defended the gains of the revolution and the land of the country at the cost of their lives and performed heroic feats during the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs on Army Day
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Martyrs on Army Day
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery Friday, the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam and other leading officials of the party, state and the army, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) and other people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets and flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and paid silent tribute to the memory of the woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Seen on the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong were wreaths in the names of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK. Placed on the wreath-laying stands of the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery were wreaths in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of KPA, scientific, educational, literature, art, public health and media organs, party, armed forces and power bodies, city-level organs and farms in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to the memory of the martyrs who remained intensely loyal to the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and devoted their all to the sacred cause for the party, leader, country and the people.
					
					 They then looked round the cemeteries.
					
					 Wreaths were laid before the sculptures of martyrs, cemeteries and towers to the memory of KPA martyrs and at martyrs' cemeteries in different parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Chinese Friendship Visiting Group Arrives
articles.content:
Chinese Friendship Visiting Group Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A friendship visiting group of the China National Tourism Administration led by its Vice-Chairman Du Yili arrived here Friday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Chinese Friendship Visiting Group
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Chinese Friendship Visiting Group
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- A friendship visiting group of the China National Tourism Administration laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and paid tribute on Friday.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Young People Celebrate Army Day
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Young People Celebrate Army Day
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in Pyongyang and local areas on Friday, the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 They began with songs "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" at the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the Arch of Triumph, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other venues in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants presented dances in boundless reverence for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who set world examples in building the revolutionary armed forces of Juche and developed the KPA into matchless and powerful revolutionary Paektusan army holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 They danced to the tune of "The Guerrilla March", "Unforgettable Echoes over Lagoon Samil", "Our General Is the Best" and other songs. The mood revved up as "Our Leader Loved by People" and other songs blared reflecting the determination of the enthusiastic Songun youth vanguard to always advance straight forward to the final victory of the great Paektusan nation under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. They danced cheerfully, clapping their hands to the tune of songs like "Wherever We Go, We'll Never Forget Our Comradeship" and "At a Breath".
					
					 The dancing parties in Pyongyang ended with the chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Upholds Leadership of Marshal Only".
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Delegations of People Visit KPA Units
articles.content:
Delegations of People Visit KPA Units
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the people visited units of the Korean People's Army on the occasion of its 82nd anniversary.
					 Service personnel of the units welcomed the delegations.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un sent gifts to units of the army. Gift-conveying ceremonies took place there.
					
					 Gifts associated with the loving care of Kim Jong Un were conveyed to units amid enthusiastic applauses of the participants.
					
					 Service personnel of the army vowed to remain loyal to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un and prepare themselves to be vanguard fighters of the Songun revolution and human bombs and bullets defending him.
					
					 The members of the delegations warmly hugged happy soldiers of the supreme commander as if they met their own kinsmen.
					
					 They told about their home news to soldiers and handed over aid materials they prepared with sincerity.
					
					 They looked around units which covered the path of victory and glory under the leadership of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They heard a report made at a meeting for celebrating the 82nd anniversary of the KPA together with the solders and joined them in other colorful events.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., KSYL
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., KSYL
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave a performance in the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding to celebrate the 82nd anniversary of the Korean People's Army on Friday. The performance started with narration and mixed choruses "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Korean People's Army".
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers like light music "Serial Revolutionary Songs".
					
					 The performers highly praised immortal exploits of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the founder and builder of the Korean revolutionary armed forces who are great symbols of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Numbers like female solo "We Cannot Live without You" and mixed quartet "Joy of the People" truthfully depicted the reverence of young vanguard members of Songun revolution for supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also given there were numbers dealing with young vanguard fighters who are demonstrating their might as a reserve combat unit, special detachment of the supreme commander and scout party of the general advance.

articles.title: Delegation of Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia Goes Back
articles.content:
Delegation of Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia Goes Back
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Sakhalin Regional Government of Russia led by Gakh Elena Nikolayevna, deputy minister of Economic Development, went back home Friday.

articles.title: U.S. President's Tour to Asia under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. President's Tour to Asia under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- 26 Japanese and 55 south Korean civic organizations released a joint declaration on April 22 to denounce the tour of U.S. President Obama to the Asian region, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News.
					 The U.S. claims Obama's tour is aimed to strengthen diplomacy, economy and security system in the Asia-Pacific region, the declaration said, terming it a dangerous move to further Washington's hegemonic military policy in Asia.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. reinforces its forces in Asia, concentrates its naval troops in the areas of the Pacific and tightens triangular military alliance with south Korea and Japan under the pretext of "threats from the north" and "conflict over territory".
					
					 The U.S. is keen on arms buildup to perfect the combined armed forces system as the Asian version of NATO.
					
					 The declaration urged the U.S., south Korea and Japan to stop the moves of reinforcing offensive weapons, adding:
					
					 The U.S. government, stop supporting Japan in its exercise of the "right to collective self-defence"!
					
					 The U.S. government, start negotiations for building the peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean peninsula and in Northeast Asia at once!
					
					 The Japanese government, stop trying for possession of the "right to collective self-defence" and revision of the pacifist constitution!
					
					 The south Korean "government", lift the "May 24 Measure" and come out for the overhaul of the south-north relations!

articles.title: Japanese Authorities' Moves to Suppress Chongryon Protested in Different Countries
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Moves to Suppress Chongryon Protested in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Political parties, organizations and personages of different countries protested against the Japanese authorities' crackdown on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) from April 10 to 16.
					 The vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt in a statement expressed resentment against the Japanese authorities for making an illegal decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall of Chongryon, saying:
					
					 Japan has refused to honestly redeem its past crimes though it perpetrated unpardonable crimes against the Korean people after occupying Korea.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' outrageous violence against Koreans in Japan is a manifestation of Japan's undisguised hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 They should seriously respond to the demand of the world people and stop at once the moves for the sale of the Korean Hall.
					
					 The Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League and the France-Korea Friendship Association made public statements denouncing the Japanese authorities for discriminating Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They extended support and solidarity to Chongryon in its activities for Koreans in Japan including the action to ensure the educational rights of Korean students, urging the Japanese authorities to respect the legitimate rights of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran in a letter sent to the Japanese embassy in Tehran and the Japanese ministers of Justice and Foreign Affairs protested against the Japanese authorities' brigandish decision and urged them to properly settle the issue of the Korean Hall, center of activities of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Representatives of political parties of Palestine, Chile, Colombia and Puerto Rico residing in Cuba sent a joint letter of protest to the Japanese embassy in Havana.
					
					 They branded the moves to forcibly seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon as a violation of the rights of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meeting, film show and book exhibition took place in Mongolia, Brazil and Germany from April 9 to 11 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun).
					 On display at the venues of the events were Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" and other works and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean film "The Tower of the Juche Idea."
					
					 A member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Society said that the august name of Kim Il Sung, a distinguished statesman and great man recognized by the world, is deeply cherished in the hearts of the Mongolian people.
					
					 The efforts and feats performed by the President for the development of Mongolia-DPRK friendly relations would shine forever through generations, he noted, vowing to make every effort to consolidate the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, praised Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for their undying exploits performed for defending the sovereignty of the country and nation and laying an eternal foundation for the prosperity of socialist Korea under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany and other speakers highly praised the immortal exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed by clearly indicating the road to be followed by humankind.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the remembrance meeting held in Germany.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Celebrations were held by the Belarus February 16 Society for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics, the Poland-Korea Association and the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association on April 12 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the reelection of Marshal Kim Jong Un as first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Oleg Novikov, chairman of the Belarus Society, spoke highly of the exploits of the President, who founded the Juche idea and Songun idea and defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, said:
					
					 It was one of the exploits performed by the President for the era and history that he founded the Juche idea, a unique guiding idea for the cause of independence.
					
					 The impregnable fortress of socialism which was built by the President in the DPRK on the basis of the Juche idea was the greatest heritage he left for the progressive humankind. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un, reliable successor to the cause of the preceding leaders, is leading the Korean people's struggle to victory.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the DR Congolese Association, said the U.S.-led imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices would never work on the DPRK led by Kim Jong Un and the desire of the progressives for a free and peaceful world would come true without fail.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in Belarus and DR Congo.

articles.title: Bird Flu Breaks Out in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Breaks Out in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Bird flu broke out in Jinchon, North Chungchong Province, south Korea on April 21, according to KBS.
					 700 domestic fowls were buried and travel into and out of the area is banned.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in UK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in UK 
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its internet website the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" on April 6. 
					 The work, published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993), comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity. The ways include the issues of founding a unified state through the unity of the whole nation, getting united in the spirit of patriotism and national independence, promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests, putting an end to all political disputes that foment division and confrontation between fellow countrymen, achieving confidence and unity between the north and the south and joining hands for national reunification without rejecting each other because of differing isms.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Idea, Cause Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Idea, Cause Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Indian paper Defence and Humanity allocated one whole page to articles illustrated with a photo of the President on April 3.
					
					 The article "The eternal sun" said:
					
					 The President showed humankind the way ahead and embraced all people with his warm affection just like sunshine, loving them with ardent zeal and devotion.
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and exploits are shining forever like the sun.
					
					 The Korean people have him lie in state at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun and uphold him as the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 He will always live as the eternal sun of humankind.
					
					 The April 12th issue of Suara Karya, an Indonesian paper, carried an article which said he is enjoying profound reverence from the people for his great exploits on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 Uruguayan paper La Juventud on April 13 carried an article "President Kim Il Sung, man of great eminence in the 20th century" with a portrait of the smiling President. It said that he built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 A Guinean broadcasting service aired a special program under the title "Birth of Kimilsungia" on April 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in UK, Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in UK, Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, April 25 (KCNA) -- British and Nigerian organizations made public statements on April 9 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said that the world progressives praise and respect Kim Il Sung as not only the eternal President and benevolent father of the Korean people but also the prominent leader of the cause of global independence and great teacher of the popular masses. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung performed undying exploits on behalf of the era and history, the statement said.
					
					 The Juche idea, the DPRK and Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, his precious revolutionary legacy, are shining and prospering under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, it noted, adding President Kim Il Sung is immortal.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association in its statement said Kim Il Sung created the Juche idea, Songun idea and opened a new era of independence in which the popular masses independently and creatively hew out their own destinies as the master of the world. 
					
					 It noted that the President, who opened the era of independence and devoted his whole life to victorious advance of the human cause of independence, will be immortal along with the cause of independence steadily advancing generation after generation.

articles.title: Informacion de ACNC sobre detencion de un norteamericano
articles.content:
Informacion de ACNC sobre detencion de un norteamericano
 Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- El organo correspondiente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea detuvo el pasado dia 10 a un ciudadano estadounidense llamado Miller Matthew Todd (24 anos de edad), quien hizo acto imprudente en el proceso de control de su entrada a la RPDC con el proposito turistico.
					 El violo el orden legal de la RPDC despedazando la visa de turismo, expedida de modo legal por nuestro organo correspondiente y gritando que "Voy a exilarme" y "He venido aqui para buscar un refugio".
					
					 El organo correspondiente lo detuvo por la gravedad de su acto y esta investigandolo.

articles.title: Periodicos saludan el 82o aniversario de fundacion del EPC
articles.content:
Periodicos saludan el 82o aniversario de fundacion del EPC
 Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Hoy es el 82o aniversario de la fundacion (el 25 de abril de 1932) del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					 Con motivo de esta efemeride, los periodicos coreanos publicaron hoy los editoriales destacando que es invencible el Ejercito Popular de Corea, fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de tipo jucheano. 
					
					 El diario Rodong Sinmun senala que gracias a la fundacion de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, se ha sentado la firme base para el cumplimiento de la idea y la causa del lider y la revolucion coreana pudo registrar desde su inicio la epopeya heroica de lucha antiimperialista. 
					
					 En el mundo no existen las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias como el EPC que sale siempre victorioso manteniendo y continuando las tradiciones revolucionarias. 
					
					 Estan grabados en los anales de la patria los imborrables meritos del EPC que en las severas decadas de la revolucion coreana, defendio a costa de la vida al partido y al lider frustrando con armas las maniobras de los traidores y elementos extranos. 
					
					 La Direccion de la Revolucion esta segura porque en todo el ejercito reina el espiritu de defensa al lider y a la comandancia, manifestado por los martires antijaponeses. 
					
					 Castigar implacablemente a los violadores de la soberania nacional es el temperamento revolucionario del ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					 El socialismo coreano es invencible porque cuenta con el ejercito revolucionario de flor y nata del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, listo para eliminar en un instante los bastiones de agresion cuando se de la orden. 
					
					 El rotativo Minju Joson puntualiza tambien que es definitiva la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, gracias al gran kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo que ilumina la ruta de avance del ejercito y pueblo coreanos, a la orientacion del Mariscal y al ejercito revolucionario sin rival del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Delegaciones de civiles visitan unidades de EPC
articles.content:
Delegaciones de civiles visitan unidades de EPC 
 Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 82o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea, las delegaciones de civiles visitaron las unidades del EPC. 
					 Los militares dieron bienvenida a las delegaciones. 
					
					 Tuvieron lugar en las unidades del EPC los actos de entrega de los regalos enviados por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Fueron entregados los regalos en medio de efusivos aplausos de los participantes. 
					
					 Los oficiales y soldados del EPC tomaron la decision de apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Mariscal sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun y prepararse como combatientes vanguardistas y suicidas de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					 Los miembros de las delegaciones de civiles felicitaron calurosamente a los soldados del Comandante Supremo. 
					
					 Los visitantes transmitieron a los militares las noticias de la retaguardia y les entregaron los materiales de ayuda preparados con sinceridad. 
					
					 Y pasaron revista a las unidades que logran victorias y glorias bajo la guia de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu. 
					
					 Luego, participaron junto con los militares en el acto por el 82o aniversario de la fundacion del EPC y otras diversas actividades.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes festejan dia de fundacion de EPC
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes festejan dia de fundacion de EPC 
 Pyongyang, 25 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este viernes en la capital y las localidades del pais los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes para festejar el 82o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					 En las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, el Arco de Triunfo, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang y otros lugares de la capital comenzaron los bailes con la interpretacion de la cancion "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung". 
					
					 Los participantes bailaron expresando gran respeto a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes crearon el modelo mundial de la construccion de autoctonas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias y desarrollaron el EPC como ejercito revolucionario sin rival del monte Paektu manteniendo en alto la bandera del Songun. 
					
					 Bailaron al compas de las canciones como "Marcha de la guerrilla", "Inolvidables ecos en el lago Samil" y "Nuestro General es el mejor". 
					
					 Aumentaron el ambiente festivo "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y otras canciones que reflejan la decision de las vanguardias juveniles del Songun de marchar a pasos firmes y por la senda directa hacia la victoria final de la potencia del monte Paektu bajo la guia del Comandante Supremo del EPC Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Los bailes terminaron con el coro "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal".
					
					 Este dia, se realizaron los bailes festivos de la juventud en todas las cabezas provinciales, ciudades y distritos.
